1: A song of David for going up to the Temple. What would have happened to us if the Lord had not been on our side? Tell us, Israel!
2: What would have happened to us if the Lord had not been on our side when people attacked us?
3: They would have swallowed us alive when they became angry with us.
4: Their armies would have been like a flood washing over us, like a river drowning us.
5: Those proud people would have been like water rising up to our mouth and drowning us.
6: Praise the Lord! He did not let our enemies tear us apart.
7: We escaped like a bird from the net of a hunter. The net broke, and we escaped!
8: Our help came from the Lord, the one who made heaven and earth!
